mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basicinfo_department( name, info, department_code, department_name, region_id) VALUES (#{name},#{info},#{departmentCode},#{departmentName},#{regionId})
mapper.update: update basicinfo_department set code = #{code}, name = #{name}, info = #{info}, department_code = #{departmentCode}, department_name = #{departmentName}, region_id = #{regionId} where code = #{code}
mapper.select: SELECT bd.code as institutionCode, bd.name, bd.info, bd.department_code, bd.department_name, br1.region_name as region, br2.region_name as country, br3.region_name as province FROM basicinfo_department AS bd left JOIN basicinfo_region AS br1 ON bd.region_id = br1.region_id left JOIN basicinfo_region AS br2 ON br1.region_parent_id = br2.region_id left JOIN basicinfo_region AS br3 ON br3.region_id = br2.region_parent_id where bd.code = #{code}
